resources.string: Please enter an ip or URL
Are you sure about the URL?
An error occurred, please try again

Packet Capture Guide
 1. Select directory for file to be saved
 2. Enter file name to be saved as.
 3. Select an interface to capture on.
 4. Press Capture Button to begin capturing.
 5. Total number of packets being captured would be shown.
 6. Press Stop Capturing Button to stop capturing.
 
 Total packets will be slightly more than displayed amount.

Android Network Sniffer, A.N.S, is a Android-based app that is allows its users to monitor traffic on their network. It also provides the basic capabilities of flagging suspicious activity and keeping track of their network.

 A.N.S has a user-friendly interface that allows the user to navigate through the app easily.

Network Sniffer application for Android
 Functionalities
 	1.Scan network devices connected to network
 	2.Sniff packets on the network
 	3.Analyse packets captured (stored in .pcap file)

1. App users (Those who do not have network experience)
 	Learning Tool for IT students
 2.Office boss
 	Provides some level of network traffic monitoring
 3.IT Professionals
 	Easy tool to use on the go
